Name: ESCAPE POINT
About the game: Death Match Mod Pick up the weapons and kill all the 8 players and zombies. Choose the weapons that perfectuate your play style and strategy. In the play time, you will respawn if you are killed. Go for REVENGE!!! Get Heal-packs and armors for recovery and defense capability to stay alive. “Kill everyone you see while you make the escape” [/b]Challenge Mod[/b] Defeat all zombies and other players You will encounter with various zombies and weapons. Shoot'em all !!! Be the one of top 8 players in the world !! 'Be the best or lose all' “Players are not the only ones that are after you.” Out-Break in the prison turned the guards and the prisoners into ZOMBIES. You must save yourself from various zombies coming for you.
